text:
AutoFi | Software Engineers | Full-time | Onsite | San Francisco, CA

AutoFi is a San Francisco-based startup providing an online checkout experience that connects car-buyers, dealerships, and lenders in real-time. You can read more about us at https://www.autofi.com/

We are hiring mid to senior JavaScript engineers across all of our teams.

Our stack is primarily React and Node, while some of our latest additions include GraphQL and Next.js.

If you're passionate about building awesome things in JavaScript, we'd love to have you. Reach out to me at jason@autofi.io
